data.title: Providing a New Generation of School Age Programming
data.text:
CAMP Has begun! Select single dates available in Williamsville, Sweet Home, and Grand Island. Some Full Weeks available at Union East for 3rd and 4th graders. Dates and rates vary by location!

We're hiring for 2024 and beyond!

Join our team of amazing educators, managers, specialists, and staff! Numerous perks and competitive wages, 401K, health care, Paid Sick Time, and FREE CHILDCARE while you work! Full time (Field Supervisor) and Part Time (managers and staff) positions available.

Schedule an informational interview: https://calendly.com/zguilliams and check out our JOBS page for more info!

UPK/PK4

AFTER SCHOOL UPK offering for Amherst (Windermere & Smallwood), Grand Island (Sidway) and Williamsville (Country Parkway and Forest), Sweet Home CSD, Theodore Roosevelt, Cleveland Hill + PK4 at most Parochial & Private Schools!

To Register for JFK School Year Program (before/after, Feb/April Break camp, Summer Club, half or full days during the current school year):

Register via: www.ezchildtrack.com/justforkids/parent Review information for your program along with the Parent Guide, located in the EZChildTrack portal (forms section).

WINTER WEATHER: Please refer to your school/district's Parent Guide (PDF is in your EZChildtrack parent portal) for program-specific details regarding Cancellation of After School Activities. If Schools are closed for emergency purposes (ie, snow day), we are also closed. If school is delayed, our AM programs are delayed accordingly.

Thank you for helping support Just for Kids efforts!!! As a program of the 501(c)3 not for profit, ChildCare Network of the Niagara Frontier, Inc., we are dedicated toward providing a safe, fun, and enriching experience for your school age child!
